title: Research existing A/B testing tools and AI CRO landscape
notes: Found AgentA/B paper, Evolv AI, VWO Copilot, syntheticusers.com

title: Research agent swarm architectures for web testing
notes: AgentA/B from Amazon uses 1000 LLM agents with personas, browser-use for web automation

title: Deep dive AgentA/B paper architecture
notes: Environment Parsing → LLM Agent → Action Execution loop. Personas drive behavior.

title: Research browser automation options (Stagehand, browser-use, Skyvern)
notes: Stagehand best for TypeScript, needs Browserbase. browser-use has TS port.

title: Research Evolv AI genetic optimization approach
notes: Multi-armed bandit, evolutionary algorithms, real-time variant mutation

title: Document architecture in RESEARCH.md
notes: Full architecture, cost estimates, implementation phases

title: Set up Browserbase account for hosted browsers
notes: Eduardo created account, API key added

title: Integrate Stagehand for AI browser automation
notes: Installed @browserbasehq/stagehand, integrated in BrowserAgent

title: Build single browser agent with persona
notes: Built BrowserAgent class with Stagehand integration

title: Implement Environment Parsing Module
notes: extractPageContent() uses Stagehand extract to get structured page data

title: Build Action Execution Module
notes: executeAction() performs scroll, click, hover, wait via Stagehand

title: Create persona generation system with realistic demographics
notes: Built persona-generator.ts with US demographics, psychographics, goals

title: Implement agent decision loop (observe → reason → act)
notes: decideNextAction() uses Claude to reason about next action

title: Build behavioral logging system
notes: AgentSessionResult tracks all actions, timing, conversions

title: Implement parallel agent execution for swarm
notes: /api/experiment runs multiple agents with batch processing

title: Build conversion tracking (form submit, CTA click, purchase)
notes: isConversionTarget() detects conversion keywords in targets

title: Build variant generator that creates real HTML/DOM changes
notes: ResearcherAgent.createVariantFromHypothesis() generates DOM changes

title: Create DOM manipulation API for variant injection
notes: BrowserAgent.applyVariantChanges() injects changes via Playwright

title: Build A/B test configuration (control vs variants)
notes: Experiment type with traffic allocation and variant assignment

title: Implement statistical significance testing
notes: calculateConfidence() in ResearcherAgent

title: Build Researcher Agent - analyzes results
notes: analyzeExperiment() aggregates results and generates insights

title: Build Researcher Agent - generates hypotheses
notes: generateHypotheses() creates testable CRO hypotheses

title: Build Researcher Agent - proposes new variants
notes: createVariantFromHypothesis() generates DOM changes

title: Implement iterative optimization loop
notes: Test → Analyze → Hypothesize → Generate → Test cycle

title: Add multi-armed bandit for traffic allocation
notes: Dynamically shift traffic to winning variants

title: Build results dashboard with real metrics
notes: Show actual agent behaviors, heatmaps, conversion funnels

title: Clean up UI - apply design principles to make app look professional
notes: Polish the actual SwarmCRO interface

title: Fix visual preview - use Browserbase screenshots instead of iframes
notes: Cross-origin iframes can't be modified. Need server-side screenshot comparison.

title: Export winning variant as implementable code
notes: Generate JavaScript snippet or CSS to apply changes

title: BUG: Fix Vercel env var loading - ANTHROPIC_API_KEY conflict
notes: System env overrides .env.local. Need to ensure Vercel vars are set correctly.

title: BUG: Add error handling for API rate limits and failures
notes: Handle Anthropic rate limits, Browserbase session limits gracefully

title: BUG: Frontend not showing real analyze/experiment results
notes: Rewrote page.tsx to use /api/analyze, shows hypotheses, variants, and copyable code

title: Test full agent experiment end-to-end
notes: Run /api/experiment with real Browserbase session and verify results

title: Add loading states and progress indicators
notes: Show agent count, current step, estimated time

title: Remove debug endpoint before production
notes: /api/debug exposes API key prefixes - remove or secure
